data.expected_result: a warning should appear saying that no audio is detected
data.short_description: activating "Discord is not detecting any input from your mic" warning doesn't work if you enable it while being connected to a voice channel
data.steps_to_repro: - have a "extra fancy mic that silences itself" when you're not talking or mute it using its software/switch - connect to a voice channel - go to voice and video settings - scroll down and toggle "Show a warning when Discord is not ..." on - close settings and observe that after couple seconds there is no warning banner
